com.adidas.ui.coordinator

Class AdidasButtonStickyBehaviour

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.adidas.ui.coordinator.AdidasButtonStickyBehaviour

  • public class AdidasButtonStickyBehaviour
extends <any>
    Custom CoordinatorLayout.Behaviour to set AdidasButton as sticky to some position in RecyclerView
